3-1 Pre-training.reason: Quotes outline data sources and some filtering but lack full, reproducible training schedules or hyper-parameters; thus Semi-Open.

3-2 Fine-tuning.reason: The multi-stage SFT / model-merging procedure is described, yet without full configs or scripts; graded Semi-Open.

4-1 Pre-training Data.reason: Sources (web text/code, synthetic, vendor, 23 languages) are named, but no sizes or public access; partial disclosure ⇒ Semi-Open.

4-2 Fine-tuning Data.reason: Lists programming-language/SQL focus and synthetic preamble generation, but omits dataset sizes and releases; Semi-Open.

4-3 Reinforcement Learning Data.reason: Mentions pairwise-comparison and verifiable-reward data for six RL experts, yet no concrete datasets; qualifies as partial disclosure.

4-4 Data Filtering.reason: Describes de-duplication, ML quality filters, heuristic safety filters and reward-based answer selection, but lacks thresholds/ratios, so counted as Semi-Open per rubric.
